name: Wind-Up Turrets
description:
Rewind Turrets

This game including 3D models, sounds, and code have all been developed in less than a week by Bryce Pellatt (brycey boy) for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme "rewind".

Objective

Play through the levels as a little dude and keep rewinding your turrets to defend yourself against an army of wind-up robots. Move your character to collect coins to purchase more turrets.

Controls
  • Use WASD to move your character
  • Use E to rewind the turrets
  • Use your MOUSE to select a turret and place by clicking a grey square
  • Use the SCROLL to zoom the camera in

Full screen recommended.

Background

This is my first game jam and second game! I've been using unity for about a month now, and have enjoyed making games in my free time.

Bugs:

If you want to restart a level, you will most likely need to refresh the page. I have found the bug and have fixed it for future updates.
